
                            
                            <p>小 13 太卡了，忍无可忍，正好京东有以旧换新活动，坚持了几个晚上终于抽到了 1100 回收券，立马下单 16P，附近没有店只能分两次回收（京东发货 16P，自己寄出旧手机给爱回收），寄出旧机后查了小红书对爱回收的评价有好有坏，就挺担心如果旧手机被压价就亏了，毕竟 8299 买的 16P，比市场价（大概 7700 吧）高了很多。刚刚查了旧机检测发现状态已经变成完成，放款中。然后没几分钟就到账了。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1002.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1002.gif">表扬一下爱回收 <br>  <br> 原贴  <br>  <br>  <br>  <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/08/212528mhlfc66lvxhzdfbe.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/08/212528mhlfc66lvxhzdfbe.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/08/212529x9h682swammhtdh0.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/08/212529x9h682swammhtdh0.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/08/212529kx94i4s2cw14m9xm.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/08/212529kx94i4s2cw14m9xm.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">赚大了。我的苹果11加价才1100</p><p class="pl">算下来16p多钱</p><p></p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
